page.title: 20THE CARNIVAL.
page.content: Sheringham has a Carnival every year and{Carnival week}is very popular with the residents and visitors. In 1985 the Carnival is between{31st July and {6th August.}The programme of events is arranged by local people and there are activities intended to interest people of all ages and interests. On Carnival Day{decorated floats}and people in {fancy dress}parade through the town from Beeston Common to the Recreation Ground.They are judged and win prizes. {Free fall parachutists and aerobatic {flying}are two events and there is also a{navy band.}All through the week there are activities and {competitions for children.}This year the children from the Primary School were asked what they liked about the Carnival and some of their comments are printed on the programme. They won Carnival mugs and entry tickets.
